remarks: Weakly Dedekind-infinite sets are exactly those with an ` _om ` -indexed descending chain of subsets.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 7-Nov-2014.)
statement:
isfin3-3 $p |- ( A e. V -> ( A e. Fin3 <-> A. f e. ( ~P A ^m _om ) ( A. x e. _om ( f ` suc x ) C_ ( f ` x ) -> |^| ran f e. ran f ) ) ) $.
$d A f x $.
$d V x $.
